ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, everyone stop arguing. No one joined this RPG to read tons of insults and complaints coming back and forth. Thecode, KSLawdogg has a point. Your emails

Received: from Yanshosh@... by imo-r16.mx.aol.com (mail_out_v27.9.) id a.97.5ec4995 (4186) for <nbwrpg@egroups.com>; Fri, 26 May 2000 20:52:42 -0400 (EDT)
Message-ID: <97.5ec4995.26607659@...>
Date: Fri, 26 May 2000 20:52:41 EDT
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"

From: Yanshosh@...

Ok, everyone stop arguing. No one joined this RPG to read tons of insults and 
complaints coming back and forth. Thecode, KSLawdogg has a point. Your emails 
have had moding in them recently, and saying that you will ignore damage is 
also moding.

Please email me with further complaints.

To everyone else: Wrestling chars are not against the rules of everything. 
Wrestling is just a form of combat. Once again, ignoring damage would be 
moding. If Thecode wants to have wrestling chars, he can, just as long as he 
fixes his moding.
